n/a
o exercise programs/rom, 
o nsaids (indomethacin), mtx, sij steroid injection. o hip arthroplasty in rare cases.
o lumbar spine symmetric syndesmophytes.

o small localized erosions of the si joints,   
  bilaterally and symmetric.

o apophyseal ankylosis.
ankylosing spondylitis.
o ankylosing spondylitis 
o reiter’s disease
o psoriatic arthritis
o enteropathic arthropathy
o hypertrophic pulomonary osteoarthropathy
49 y.o. man presents for routine follow up examination.
